definition: vocational high school/abbr. to 技校[ji4 xiao4]
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

pinyin: zhong1 deng3 ji4 shu4 xue2 xiao4

sentences.english: After graduating from middle school, Tian studied veterinary science at a technical secondary school.
sentences.chinese: 中學畢業後，田文華在一家中等技術學校學習獸醫。

sentences.english: It is also home to the Lanxiang Vocational School, which was founded with military support.
sentences.chinese: 同樣是藍翔職業技術學校所在地。

sentences.english: High school or technical school degree. Be able to use the electric instrument correctly.
sentences.chinese: 高中及技術學校以上，能正確使用電動機具。

sentences.english: She is the Chinese educational base of Guangdong Overseas Chinese Vocational School.
sentences.chinese: 她，就是廣東省華僑職業技術學校的華文教育基地。

sentences.english: The government called for the establishment of more vocational schools.
sentences.chinese: 政府號召建立更多的技術學校。

sentences.english: Could be a hand-on learning center or technical school.
sentences.chinese: 這可以是可動手操作的學習中心，或是技術學校。

sentences.english: The family did manage to send him to a technical school.
sentences.chinese: 家裏的人的確設法讓他進入了一所技術學校。

sentences.english: The personnel system reform is the core of vocational school management system reform.
sentences.chinese: 人事制度改革是職業技術學校管理體制改革的核心。

sentences.english: Gymnasium in Macao Portugal-Chinese Technical-Professional School is a finishing gymnasium .
sentences.chinese: 澳門中葡職業技術學校體育館聲學改造。

sentences.english: Guangdong Provincial Economic and Trade Vocational Schools, OK?
sentences.chinese: 廣東省經濟貿易職業技術學校好不好？
